prompts.title: Creative Ad with Hand-Drawn Doodle
prompts.description: Minimalist advertisement integrating a real object with hand-drawn doodle
prompts.prompt: A minimalist and creative advertisement set on a clean white background. A real [object like coffee cup, smartphone, sneaker] is integrated into a hand-drawn black ink doodle, using loose, playful lines. The doodle interacts with the object in a clever, imaginative way creating a sense of fun and innovation. Include bold black ad copy text at the top. High contrast, clean, conceptually smart.

prompts.title: Black and White Portrait Art
prompts.description: High-resolution black and white portrait with soft gradient background
prompts.prompt: A high-resolution black and white portrait artwork, in an editorial and fine art photography style. The background features a soft gradient, transitioning from mid-gray to almost pure white, creating depth and tranquility. Fine film grain adds tactile, analog-like softness reminiscent of classic black and white photography. Gentle directional light softly diffused.

prompts.title: Blurred Silhouette Behind Frosted Glass
prompts.description: Artistic photograph of blurred silhouette behind translucent surface
prompts.prompt: A black and white photograph shows the blurred silhouette of a [person/dancer/figure] behind a frosted or translucent surface. The figure is slightly distorted by the texture, creating an ethereal, dreamlike quality. Soft lighting from behind casts gentle shadows. Minimalist, mysterious, intimate mood.

prompts.title: Neon Cyberpunk Cityscape
prompts.description: Futuristic city scene with vibrant neon lights
prompts.prompt: A cyberpunk city street at night, rain-slicked streets reflecting vibrant neon signs in pink, blue, and purple. Towering skyscrapers with holographic advertisements. Steam rising from street vents. Cinematic wide angle, atmospheric fog, moody lighting. Ultra detailed, photorealistic.

prompts.title: Minimalist Product Photography
prompts.description: Clean product shot with gradient background
prompts.prompt: Professional product photography of a [product] on a seamless gradient background transitioning from soft white to pale blue. Perfect studio lighting with subtle shadows. Center composition. Clean, modern, commercial style. High resolution, sharp focus.

prompts.title: Watercolor Landscape
prompts.description: Soft watercolor painting of natural scenery
prompts.prompt: A serene watercolor landscape painting of rolling hills with scattered trees under a pastel sky. Soft washes of green, blue, and yellow. Loose brushstrokes, wet-on-wet technique. Dreamy, peaceful atmosphere. Traditional watercolor art style.

prompts.title: Retro 80s Poster Design
prompts.prompt: A retro 1980s style poster with bold geometric shapes, vibrant gradient colors (pink, purple, cyan, yellow). Memphis design elements. Neon grid lines. Chrome text effect. Synthwave aesthetic. High contrast, nostalgic vibe.

prompts.title: Fantasy Character Concept Art
prompts.prompt: Fantasy character concept art of a [elven warrior/wizard/rogue]. Full body character design with intricate armor/clothing details. Dynamic pose. Painterly digital art style. Dramatic lighting. Rich color palette. Professional game art quality.

prompts.title: Cozy Coffee Shop Interior
prompts.prompt: Interior of a cozy coffee shop with warm lighting, wooden furniture, plants hanging from ceiling. Large windows with soft natural light. Barista counter with espresso machine. Chalkboard menu. Warm tones, inviting atmosphere. Lifestyle photography style.

prompts.title: Abstract Geometric Art
prompts.prompt: Abstract geometric art with overlapping circles, triangles, and rectangles in bold primary colors (red, blue, yellow) on white background. Clean lines, minimalist composition. Bauhaus style influence. Modern, graphic design aesthetic.

prompts.title: Food Photography - Gourmet Dish
prompts.prompt: Professional food photography of a gourmet dish plated artistically. Shallow depth of field. Natural window lighting from the side. Rustic wooden table surface. Fresh ingredients visible. Mouthwatering presentation. Magazine quality, editorial style.

prompts.title: Magical Forest Scene
prompts.prompt: An enchanted forest scene with glowing fireflies, ancient twisted trees with luminescent mushrooms. Soft ethereal lighting filtering through fog. Magical particles floating in air. Fantasy illustration style. Rich greens and blues with glowing accents.

prompts.title: Isometric City Block
prompts.prompt: Isometric view of a modern city block with detailed buildings, streets, cars, and trees. Clean geometric style. Bright colors. Flat shading. Game asset aesthetic. Low poly style inspiration. Organized grid layout.

prompts.title: Vintage Travel Poster
prompts.prompt: Vintage travel poster in 1950s style featuring [destination like Paris, Tokyo, New York]. Bold simplified shapes, limited color palette. Art deco influence. Hand-lettered title. Nostalgic, optimistic mood. Screen print aesthetic.

prompts.title: Cute Mascot Character
prompts.prompt: Cute mascot character design of a [animal/creature]. Round simple shapes, big expressive eyes, friendly smile. Bright cheerful colors. Chibi proportions. Vector art style. Perfect for branding or children's content.

prompts.title: Dramatic Mountain Landscape
prompts.prompt: Dramatic mountain landscape at golden hour. Snow-capped peaks against colorful sky. Alpine lake in foreground with perfect reflection. Wide angle shot. Rich colors, high dynamic range. National Geographic style landscape photography.

prompts.title: Sci-Fi Spaceship Interior
prompts.prompt: Interior of a sci-fi spaceship control room. Holographic displays, sleek metallic surfaces. Futuristic control panels with glowing blue interfaces. Large viewing window showing stars. Cinematic lighting. High-tech, clean design. Movie concept art quality.

prompts.title: Botanical Illustration
prompts.prompt: Detailed botanical illustration of a [flower/plant] in vintage scientific drawing style. Precise linework showing different parts of the plant. Labeled anatomy. Watercolor accents. Cream background. Educational, elegant style.

prompts.title: Urban Street Art Mural
prompts.prompt: Vibrant street art mural on brick wall. Bold colors, dynamic composition. Mix of abstract shapes and realistic elements. Spray paint texture visible. Urban culture aesthetic. Energetic, rebellious vibe.

prompts.title: Pastel Aesthetic Bedroom
prompts.prompt: A dreamy bedroom interior in soft pastel colors - pink, lavender, mint green. Fairy lights, fluffy pillows, plants. Soft natural lighting. Instagram aesthetic. Cozy, feminine, peaceful atmosphere. Lifestyle photography style.

prompts.title: Steampunk Mechanical Device
prompts.prompt: Detailed steampunk mechanical device with brass gears, copper pipes, and ornate Victorian details. Industrial aesthetic. Warm metallic tones. Technical illustration style. Intricate craftsmanship visible.

prompts.title: Minimalist Logo Design
prompts.prompt: Minimalist logo design using simple geometric shapes. Monochromatic or limited color palette. Clean lines, balanced composition. Modern, professional, timeless. Suitable for tech/startup branding.

prompts.title: Anime Style Landscape
prompts.prompt: Anime style landscape background with detailed scenery. Vibrant colors, soft lighting. Makoto Shinkai inspired. Peaceful rural scene or urban street. Rich atmospheric perspective. High detail in foreground.

prompts.title: Abstract Paint Splatter
prompts.prompt: Abstract expressionist painting with energetic paint splatters, drips, and bold brushstrokes. Vibrant color palette. Jackson Pollock inspired. Dynamic movement, raw emotion. Contemporary art style.

prompts.title: Luxury Watch Product Shot
prompts.prompt: Luxury watch product photography. Close-up macro shot showing intricate details of mechanism. Dramatic lighting with reflections on polished metal. Black background. Professional commercial photography. Premium, elegant presentation.
